      • restartMainTask

        public boolean restartMainTask()
        Use this to restart the main task. This is useful after scheduler.cancelTasks(plugin); for example.

      • resetConfig

        public void resetConfig()
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This will overwrite the pre-saved configuration. use this after reloadConfig(), for example. This will use your main configuration (config.yml). This will call restartMainTask() internally.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • setConfig

        public void setConfig(org.bukkit.configuration.Configuration config)
               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This will overwrite the pre-saved configuration. use this after config.load(file), for example. This will use a custom configuration. This will call restartMainTask() internally.
        Parameters:
        config - The new configuration to use.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • updatePlugin

        public boolean updatePlugin(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
        Called by a player or the console to initiate updates.

        Note that the return value only indicates that the update request was accepted and the download process is scheduled to be executed. The update itself may still fail.

        Parameters:
        sender - - the player or console that is attempting to initiate an update.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the update was initiated and the download process has begun, FALSE otherwise.
